dialogs.responseText: Hi. Going spelunking? I would, but I can't be bothered, to be honest.
All sorts of things. The main thing is the smithy. If you can find it, you can make yourself some weapons with it.

Yeah, spelunking. It's what you do in caves, if you can find the motivation. This cave is supposed to have a smithy somewhere inside. Adventurers use it to make weapons. I would too, if I could be bothered trying to find it.

Oh, it's not hard. Take some copper ore to the smithy and it's mostly self-explanitory. As you improve at it, you'll figure out how to do it with other metals. To be clear, this is all hearsay, I'm too lazy to do it myself.
